Articles.Content:
Hello, I made Ju 87 in KSP. It carries 4 bombs under wings and 1 heavy bomb underneath a cockpit.

Here is some screenshots.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/Nvf1H)

It is heavy plane, kind of easy to control, but hard to maneuver and gain height (especially when bombs are equipped). Expect to lose a lot of speed when turning too fast.

Press "Abort" to toggle spoilers, 

Press "1", "2", "3" to release all bombs.

Download link: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/pdipys665ijsjqp/Ju-78.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/pdipys665ijsjqp/Ju-78.craft?dl=0)

Fly carefully ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Very nice!

I like the bombs, especially.

Repped!

![Q5166zk.png](http://i.imgur.com/Q5166zk.png)

Admittedly, the IL-2 has no bombs.
